task.summary: More work on server-client transformation. Kind of finished server-side.
More work on server-client transformation. Finished basic server and client (gui). Still configured to '127.0.0.10'
More work on preprocessing - got word segmentation mostly right
More work on preprocessing: finished word segmentation. Working on contour detection in individual words - some success; more work to be done.
More work on preprocessing - contours, SON!
More work on preprocessing - finished contour cropping on testing area, implementing it in code.

More work on preprocessing - (theoretically) finished implementation of contour cropping. Possible problem: the threshold of opencv's threshold function shouldn't be constant. NEEDS TESTING ON REAL EXAMPLES!
Finished preprocessing! Ta da! Still needs blackbox testing, and it's still messy as hell
IT'S ALLIIIIVVVVVEEEEE!!! Still needs to learn how to customize the thresholds though. Problematic...
Work done on customized thresholds. Also turned 'preprocessing' into a class called 'preprocessor'.
Done tittle_segmentation, done line_segmentation. Still no idea about word segmentation... Will start working on speeding up the network by inputting into GPU memory all at once in a moment
Added the ContourClass necessary for test_line_threshold_auto. Added useful testing pictures

MASSIVE improvement to performance! Mainly changed the way the GPU memory was accessed: instead of accessing the memory for every character separately, it now accesses the memory only once, "uploading" all the characters at once, and running through them with the net in much the same way the net trains itself. Because of the way GPU memory works, this is significantly faster, taking AROUND 3 seconds to classify an entire page. Do note that a non-insignificant amount of time (around 2-3 seconds or so) is taken to separate the image to characters, depending on the image size.
Finished (?) autocomplete. Also uploaded 2 .txt files: big_merged.txt - lots of words, used in autocomplete. bla.txt - input for the autocomplete. The raw output from the net. VERY temporary.
Minor changes. Linked server.py with autocomplete.py
Finishing touches - added message box and "save text" option to the gui

Because of the way GPU memory works, this is significantly faster, taking AROUND 3 seconds to classify an entire page. Do note that a non-insignificant amount of time (around 2-3 seconds or so) is taken to separate the image to characters, depending on the image size.
